name: Mega Man X - Fighting Arena
description:
What is Mega Man X - Fighting Arena?
Is a "fan made" 2D Fighting Game under development by AlexDX4 (code, gameplay designer, ui designer, AI code, sound code, sprite edit) and FXFreitas (sprite maker), with the collaboration of Rocklu, V-Nico, IrregularSaturn, NONE/dragon, CommandMissionFan (Rods.) and many others.

Demo info: 

This demo is an "expansion" of the 'Public Demo 2019', and contains all characters & stages was be coded until 2019. The 2019 demo was originally made under pressure from the team, during the last six months of development, there were several changes that were imposed against my will, just to try to please everyone involved.
I'm releasing this, because i will rebalance all these characters to fit them to the changes of the new gameplay.

[ Content ]
6 Playable Characters:
X, Zero, Alia, Iris, Sigma W and X Command Mission;
12 Stages:
Future Highway, Reploid Factory Entrance, Hunter Base, Sky Lagoon, Repliforce Aircraft, Colony Eurasia's Secret Laboratory, Training Stage, Air Force, Air Force
At Night, Jakob's Top, Lagrano Ruins and Berkana's Evil Chamber.

[ Buttons ]
A = (AT) - Action Trigger

X = (LA) - Light Attack
Y = (MA) - Medium Attack
B = (HA) - Heavy Attack

C = (PD) - Phantom Dash
Z = (OO) - Overclock / Overdrive

A+X / (AT+LA) = Throw/Grab
Y+B / (MA+HA) = ReAct

[ Gameplay ]
Normal Attacks can usually cancel into one another, generally following the order:
(L)ight, (M)edium, (H)eavy;

Action Trigger: Is a unique abilitie of each character in the game, in other words,
is the signature move representing each character and their play-style, for example: X's Charge Shot is his Action Trigger;

ReAct: Your character will briefly flash white, then perform a reversal action, like a "shoryuken" or a "counter attack".
